 and see what age am I

and is there gonna be any

 have I just signed

   leave my money in

years, 10 years.

  sometimes, for some people,

  investment choices.

 different investment choices.

 very young purchase annuities.

And I've had clients that
 are older purchase annuities.

1494.text: A retired person may just want

1499.text: They may want to make sure

single, it really just depends,

1507.text:

somebody is looking for.

 but they are fabulous,
